title: E-commerce Platform
description: Complete e-commerce platform with admin panel, payment gateway, and inventory management system.
context: Development of a modern and scalable e-commerce platform for a retail company that needed to digitize their business and improve user experience.
solution: I implemented a microservices architecture with React/TypeScript on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, integrating secure payment gateways and a real-time inventory management system.
results: The platform achieved a 250% increase in online sales, reduced loading time by 40%, and processes over 10,000 monthly transactions with 99.9% uptime.
role: Lead Full Stack Developer - Architecture, frontend/backend development, API integration and deployment.

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time data analysis system with interactive visualizations and automated reports.
context: Creation of a data analysis dashboard for a fintech startup that needed to visualize business metrics and KPIs in real-time for strategic decision making.
solution: I developed a SPA with Vue.js and D3.js for advanced visualizations, connected to a Python/FastAPI backend that processes real-time data using WebSockets and Redis as cache.
results: The dashboard processes over 1 million data points per second, reduces report generation time by 80%, and improves executive decision-making.
role: Frontend Lead - UX/UI design, component development, performance optimization and API integration.

title: Mobile Banking App
description: Digital banking mobile application with biometric authentication and instant transfers.
context: Development of a mobile banking application for a digital bank seeking to offer modern and secure financial services to millennials and Gen Z users.
solution: I built a cross-platform native app with React Native, implementing biometric authentication, banking API integration, push notifications, and a security-focused UX design.
results: The app reached 50,000+ downloads in the first 6 months, maintains a 4.8/5 star rating, and has processed over $2M in transactions with 0 security incidents.
role: Mobile Developer - Full-stack development, financial API integration, security implementation and testing.
